Description: You absorb your Stockpiled energy to heal your wounds. When activated after using Stockpile, regain a base hit points. The dice roll is doubled if two rounds of energy were Stockpiled. The dice roll is tripled if three rounds of energy were Stockpiled.
Scaling: Higher Levels: The base healing dice roll for this move changes to 1d12 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.
